select.if: SELECT MAX(SEQ) AS SEQ FROM LOG_${hogi}DCC_ALARM WHERE ALMXYGUBUN = #{xyGubun}
SELECT MAX(SEQ) AS SEQ FROM LOG_${hogi}DCC_ALARM WHERE ALMXYGUBUN = #{xyGubun} AND SEQ < #{pagNo}
SELECT MIN(SEQ) AS SEQ FROM LOG_${hogi}DCC_ALARM WHERE ALMXYGUBUN = #{xyGubun} AND SEQ > #{pagNo}
SELECT MAX(SEQ) AS SEQ FROM LOG_${hogi}DCC_ALARM WHERE ALMXYGUBUN = #{xyGubun} AND SEQ < #{pagNo} AND PAGNO <= #{currentPage}
SELECT MIN(SEQ) AS SEQ FROM LOG_${hogi}DCC_ALARM WHERE ALMXYGUBUN = #{xyGubun} AND SEQ > #{pagNo} AND PAGNO >= #{currentPage}

mapper.select: SELECT ALMGUBUN, substring(ALMDATE,12,15) AS ALMTIME, ALMMSECCHK, ALMCODE, ALMADDRESS, ALMMESG, CONVERT(CHAR(10),ALMDATE,111) AS ALMYEAR, ALMMESGLINE, CONVERT(CHAR(23),ALMDATE,21) AS ALMDATE, PAGNO, PAGLINE, SEQ FROM LOG_${hogi}DCC_ALARM WHERE ALMXYGUBUN = #{xyGubun} AND SEQ = #{seq} ORDER BY PAGLINE

select.if: SELECT MAX(SEQ) AS SEQ FROM LOG_${hogi}DCC_SUMMARY WHERE ALMXYGUBUN = #{xyGubun}
SELECT MAX(SEQ) AS SEQ FROM LOG_${hogi}DCC_SUMMARY WHERE ALMXYGUBUN = #{xyGubun} AND SEQ < #{pagNo}
SELECT MIN(SEQ) AS SEQ FROM LOG_${hogi}DCC_SUMMARY WHERE ALMXYGUBUN = #{xyGubun} AND ALMDATE >= #{startDate}
SELECT MIN(SEQ) AS SEQ FROM LOG_${hogi}DCC_SUMMARY WHERE ALMXYGUBUN = #{xyGubun} AND SEQ > #{pagNo}

mapper.select:
SELECT
TOP 1
SCANTIME,
${tValue} AS TVALUE
TVALUE13 AS TVALUE
TVALUE14 AS TVALUE
FROM LOG_${sHogi}DCC_TREND
WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
WHERE SEQ = 60
WHERE SEQ = 70
AND SCANTIME = #{endDate}
AND SCANTIME between #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
ORDER BY SCANTIME DESC
ORDER BY SCANTIME ASC
